title: Bug 114905 - Default value in report parameter list box lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Set a default value in the list box of the report parameter.
2. Modify the default value and save the changes.
3. Check if the modified default value is retained in the list box or lost.
